MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML8 postcode area of Carluke.  We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties and our engineers are on site patrolling the lines to trace and repair the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:40pm on 8th December 2020.
